Get Started

LearnQuran & Arabic
Together,As a Family

We believe learning the Quran and Arabic should feel natural and uplifting. That's why our online classes are built around family, comfort, and encouragement.

Here, you won't feel pressure or fear—only guidance, patience, and motivation to achieve your goals.

Together, we make learning the Quran and Arabic a meaningful journey for every member of the family.

Start Learning Now

Our Teaching Values

At AlephLam, we've crafted a unique approach to Islamic education that puts comfort, understanding, and family bonds at the heart of learning.

Nurturing Environment

We create a safe space where every student feels valued and supported. Fear has no place in our classrooms—only encouragement and patience.

Personalized Learning

Every student learns differently. Our teachers adapt their methods to match your pace, ensuring deep understanding rather than rushed progress.

Family-Centered Approach

Learning together strengthens family bonds. We design our programs so parents and children can embark on this spiritual journey side by side.

Excellence in Teaching

Our qualified teachers combine traditional Islamic scholarship with modern teaching methods, making complex concepts accessible and engaging.

How We Teach

Our time-tested methodology combines traditional Islamic education with modern teaching techniques

1

Assessment & Goal Setting

We begin by understanding your current level and learning objectives, creating a personalized roadmap for your Quranic journey.

2

Interactive Learning

Through live sessions, we engage students with interactive recitation, comprehension exercises, and practical applications of Islamic teachings.

3

Continuous Support

Regular feedback, recorded sessions for review, and ongoing mentorship ensure steady progress and long-term retention.

Our Courses

Choose from our comprehensive range of courses designed for all ages and levels. Each course is carefully crafted to ensure optimal learning outcomes.

Quran Courses

Nouraniyyah

Monthly
Beginner
30€

Learn correct reading of Quranic words starting from letters using the typical Nouraniyyah spelling method, up to complete verses. Basic Tajweed rules are also taught.

What You'll Learn:

Letter recognition
Word building
Basic Tajweed
Verse reading

Noorul-Bayaan

Monthly
Intermediate
30€

A very popular method for learning Quran reading. From letters to reciting Quranic verses. Through spelling words and naming Tajweed rules.

What You'll Learn:

Advanced spelling
Tajweed rules
Verse recitation
Pronunciation

Tajweed Intensive - LIVE

Monthly
Advanced
30€

A comprehensive course covering all areas of Tajweed science. Learn different reading styles with focus on Hafs-an-Asim.

What You'll Learn:

Complete Tajweed
Reading styles
Articulation points
Scientific approach

Hifz-Al Quran

Monthly
All Levels
25€

For memorizing the Quran. Learn 1-2 verses per week with regular reviews and checks of previously learned material.

What You'll Learn:

Verse memorization
Regular reviews
Progress tracking
Personal guidance

Reading Correction

Monthly
All Levels
25€

For students who can recite Quran slowly and need help with Tajweed rules. Uses the Taqliid (imitation) method.

What You'll Learn:

Pronunciation correction
Tajweed application
Fluency improvement
Personal feedback

Arabic Language Courses

Madina Arabic

Monthly
Beginner to Advanced
35€

Focus on grammar and analyzing individual sentence parts. Build vocabulary through everyday and religious dialogues.

What You'll Learn:

Grammar focus
Sentence analysis
Vocabulary building
Religious context

Bayna Yadaik

Monthly
Intermediate to Advanced
35€

Uses "Al Arabiya bayna Yadayk" book series with many dialogues on everyday topics that promote free speaking.

What You'll Learn:

Conversational Arabic
Everyday dialogues
Free speaking
Hadith & Quran

AlephLam Kids

Alif Ba for Children (4+)

Monthly
4+ years
20€

Children are introduced to letters playfully through various tasks and learn to recognize, pronounce, and name them safely.

What You'll Learn:

Letter recognition
Pronunciation
Interactive learning
30 min sessions

Tajweed Poems & Reading

Monthly
6+ years
25€

Children learn Tajweed rules through easily understandable poems and recite Quranic verses together.

What You'll Learn:

Tajweed poems
Verse recitation
Rule application
45 min sessions

Hifz for Children

Monthly
7+ years
20€

For children who want to memorize Quran in a motivating way. Our loving teachers support your child patiently.

What You'll Learn:

Motivational approach
Patient guidance
Regular practice
Progress tracking

Learn Prayer with BaTut

Monthly
5+ years
25€

Our most popular course. No child leaves without being able to perform the 5 daily prayers independently.

What You'll Learn:

Prayer teaching
Daily practice
Motivation
45 min sessions
